name: Sentinels
description: Sentinels is a tower defense game lovingly spliced with a first person shooter. Prepare your defenses, then jump into the fray yourself!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2GHz dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3GHz quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 560 or AMD HD 6870 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
